origin: {svg <svg width="500" height="500" viewBox="0 0 500 500" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"> #background# #circle# #rectangle# #triangle# #lines# #dots# #ellipse# </svg> svg art}
circle: <circle cx="#randomX#" cy="#randomY#" r="50" fill="#color#" stroke="\#000" stroke-width="3"/>
rectangle: <rect x="#randomX#" y="#randomY#" width="100" height="100" fill="#color#" stroke="\#000" stroke-width="3"/>
lines: <line x1="50" y1="400" x2="200" y2="300" stroke="\#000" stroke-width="4" stroke-dasharray="10,5"/><line x1="300" y1="200" x2="400" y2="100" stroke="\#000" stroke-width="3" stroke-dasharray="5,5"/>
ellipse: <ellipse cx="#randomX#" cy="#randomY#" rx="40" ry="20" fill="#color#"/> <path d="M250 400 C300 450, 400 350, 450 400" stroke="\#000" fill="#color#" stroke-width="3"/>
